original_title: UFC on ESPN 18: Smith vs. Clark
overview: UFC on ESPN 18: Smith vs. Clark was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on November 28, 2020, at the UFC Apex facility in Enterprise, Nevada, part of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Area, United States. Former UFC Light Heavyweight Championship challenger Anthony Smith faced Devin Clark in the headliner.
title: UFC on ESPN 18: Smith vs. Clark
